item.title: Quorum
item.description: :ID: 42950824-228d-48d6-abec-4e18908dfca0 Quorum means “majority”, and the idea behind quorum is easy to understand: if the cluster doesnâ€™t have quorum, no actions will be taken in the cluster. This by itself would offer a good solution to avoid the [BROKEN LINK: 582a4090-eb66-4dfd-8166-9acd3c97dcc9] problem. But to make sure that it can never happen, that multiple nodes activate the same resources in the cluster, another mechanism is used as well. This mechanism is known as [BROKEN LINK: 789326a5-20aa-4492-acb6-1474c3c11a4a].
